Review.Contenu: Work with the scamming company HDC in Miami. Don’t rent at HDC!! Search on Scammers, driving license, Sunpass etc

Review.Titre: Deposit withheld and poor customer service
Review.Contenu: The initial rental experience of booking and confirming through Rentcars was good, easy to use and quick. After that the experience got rapidly less pleasant. The company that they used to supply the cars was definitely not one shown on their website. The quality of the car we rented was terrible. And the service from them worse. Trying to contact Rentcars and get help from them is difficult, only emails and very slow. But the response when you got it was always the same - not our problem. The final straw and why I would suggest never using Rentcars is that the rental company has withheld my deposit. Rentcars says the company has 30 working days to return it and even when that has passed the deposit has not been returned and no help from Rentcars. Rentcars use sub contractors. They advertise the big names on their website but when you boom it’s with the least reputable companies out there.

Review.Titre: they charged me double the price that was agreed in advance
Review.Contenu: Very bad experience with the Guerin rental company in Portugal. At the end of the hire, they charged me double the price that was agreed in advance. I complained through their website 4 times, it's been 3 weeks and I still haven't heard from them. This is very serious to me. If this is not stopped, more people will continue to fall into the trap by their own hands.

Review.Titre: I completed the online booking form in…
Review.Contenu: I subsequently had a reply from RentCars which was a link to their full Terms and Conditions which mentioned possible charges for over aged 70s drivers. THESE WERE NOT LISTED during the online booking process or the price quoted. The final price was 5 times more.!

Review.Titre: Worst Rental experience so far
Review.Contenu: One reservation choose unlimited mileage: Ended up having limited mileage.Other reservation on Suisse airport, Ended up with a car from the French SIDE of geneve airport.Don't use this company.

Review.Titre: They took my deposit and rental company was no where to be seen
Review.Contenu: They took my deposit and sent me confirmation voucher and code. When I got to the airport, the rental company in Abu Dhabi said they had cancelled the contract as the price was incorrect (something to do with not including airport fee) - so when I challenged them why they took my money, they said it is not us and instead Rentcars.com who by the way have an intentional Brazil number you can call (£££) in order to rectify your issues - the relevant emails that came to my inbox were also in Portuguese for the booking.  Even 24hrs prior to the booking they sent me a confirmation email reminding me how my reservation was all green to go, whereas, the rental company had never accepted it.So we were left with my five daughters aged 1 to 10 with no car and no way of getting a taxi legally from the airport as they are not allowed to let more than 6 passengers into a taxi (officially, and the airport needs to be squeaky clean) - the reason I was hiring a 7 seater in the first place.

Review.Titre: ❌ TOTAL SCAM ❌

They made so easy to get a reservation but made it so hard to get your money back. I will never use this website again to look for rental cars. I will go with the big companies even if I have to pay more. At least there is no surprise fees. I feel like I was cheated. Review.Titre: Terrible company with all kind of…
Review.Contenu: This is about Routes Car Rental in Orlando, FLTerrible company with all kind of ridiculous rules that were not disclosed at the time of booking. Ultimately they left me stranded with no cars in Orlando in the middle of the night!Here are the details: I booked a car from them from Orlando Airport for 11/12-11/17/2023. While booking they said that they do not rent to Florida residents and I should have a return flight ticket. I was fine with both conditions. When I went to rent, they tell me that my return flight ticket has to be on the same day as their return of car...that was never mentioned. My return was on 11/19/23 as I did not need the car from 11/18-11/19/2023. Bocuse of this they refused to rent me the car. Left me stranded in Orlando with no car at 11:30 PM in an unsafe area outside their rental office. I had to get a Lyft to get out of this unsafe place. The staff were very uncooperative and inconsiderate even though it was their unclear policy that left me stranded!Never rent them...they will try to get you some way or other!

Review.Titre: I paid in full for my rental but received bogus charges anyway

For me this is simply bananas. I've used rentcars many times before, but this time it was really a bad experience.

Review.Titre: POOR HELP

Although the rental company representative had told me that the amount already paid to RentCars should be refunded, up to now I have received no indication that it will happen.I visited the rental company again and another representative advised me to insist on this matter with RentCars as "they might want to keep the money".The WhatsApp communication did not help much.

Review.Titre: Charged another 200 euros
Review.Contenu: The car company charged another 200 euros after the car was handed over, promising to send an invoice, but I never received it despite writing to them countless times. Therefore, I cannot get it covered by my own insurance.

Review.Titre: Tried three different cards from United…
Review.Contenu: Tried three different cards from United States (MasterCard, Visa, Discover), and one from Brazil, all rejected. Finally had to ask a friend to use his PIX to pay for rental.

Review.Titre: I had the worst experience
Review.Contenu: I had the worst experience. I was traveling with my family and the car never arrived at the airport. The office was closed and nobody was able to solve the problem. So we paid a taxi to drive us tonthe hotel. Next morning I went to pick up the car at downtown office where I had to pay another 68 dlls. I Will never recommend this site.

Review.Titre: WARNING! WARNING!! WARNING!!!
Review.Contenu: WARNING ! WARNING ! !  WARNING ! ! !As I stated before this car rental place is the WORSE!!! DON'T DO IT!!! This is my 2nd NEGATIVE REVIEW.  REASON... 1. DECEPTIVE 2. OVERCHARGED 3. NOT UP FRONT W/PRICING 4. BAD BUSINESS PRACTICES I wish I could hv.left 0 stars...

Review.Titre: Car  in bad mechanical conditions
Review.Contenu: The suv showed “oil engine check required”, the breaks make big noise, the service tag shown service required 5,000 km ago,  so we were forced to return the unit and change and they gave us a very bad service when changing it.  I would not rent a car with Europcar again.

Review.Titre: S C A M
Review.Contenu: S C A M IS A BIG NONO I can give this creepy company minus 10 starts, they got it -**********. Nobody to pick us after being waiting as the instructions said. The drivers of other companies were very helpful but no one know this company, there was no information online about the company (yes! My mistake). No phone number in the States, they have a phone number we found with area code +55 which is Brazil, they didn’t pick up. Don’t waste your precious time and money. Will be reported to consumers affairs so can’t do business anymore.

Review.Titre: Hidden costs
Review.Contenu: Prior booking no deposit charge provided. On arrival asked to pay 1700€ for deposit for 3 days which is ridiculous! Given option to pay less deposit but topped up with 20€ a day additional charge for "insurance" This is simply fraud!

Review.Titre: One missed step after another
Review.Contenu: I had a change of flights. It shortened my trip by one day. When I asked if the car I reserved could be held for one, I didn't ask for money back, same drop off time, they said no.I was contacted by a customer service rep from Rentcars who offered to cancel the reservation at a cost. I said "yes please" 1 hour after the reps email was delivered to my account.It is now three days later. I never heard back from the rep but I have been charged the full cost.Obviously, not feeling real happy about this series of interactions.

Review.Titre: Medium service
Review.Contenu: Medium service, deposit taken on the credit card was cashed down instead of retained. After 6 weeks upon the car was return, still waiting to get my money back.

Review.Titre: There were no cars available
Review.Contenu: There were no cars available. I had to cancel at the rental place but I can’t get in touch with anyone at Rentcars to get a refund. I took a picture of the receipt showing that the rental company (Dollar) issued a refund but how do I send it to you guys so that I can get my refund back from you.

Review.Titre: Avoid
Review.Contenu: Website was slow and awful.None of my cards would be accepted. Still haven't heard back from the customer service email address and gave up on the phoneline after 20 minutes on hold. Would recommend anyone to avoid this company.

Review.Titre: I am sorry to say I can not change or…
Review.Contenu: I am sorry to say I canceled my car rental reservation but did not get the full amount I paid to rentcars company, although I rebooked another reservation later on!If you get my message, someone can call me to discuss it at 1-416-358-3147

Review.Titre: Don’t rent from them
Review.Contenu: Don’t rent from them. Lied about rental company being at the airport and it was off site, failed to provide insurance info. If you do make sure your insurance carrier is recognized by the site. I have travelers insurance, which I found out wasn’t accepted when picking my car up from Priceless in Tampa, Fl. As soon as we checked in, Priceless offered a refund, but they know all other places are out of cars and the guy at the counter said it happens all the time because it’s not clear and that’s why they (Priceless) is quick to offer a refund. Príceless was great, but Rent Cars is terrible. Long story short I paid more for an off airport rental car than I would have renting at the airport. Original price $210, statement stated nothing due at pickup. Insurance was $25 a day and I had to buy it or not get the car.

Review.Titre: Booked car for Limoges Airport- only to…
Review.Contenu: Booked car for Limoges Airport- only to be told I had had to goto Limoges City centre on arrival at airport. 60 euro return journey. Email confirmation states Limoges Airport pick up. Will not use Rent cars again.

Review.Titre: Horrible experience. A rip off.
Review.Contenu: Horrible experience.A rip off1. No counter l, just a booth to talk to screen, with someone on the other's identity. Lines keeps breaking.2. Booking made with AMEX.They charged AMEX But when I went to pick up the car, the lady said, they don't use AMEX and she is doing exception to use AMEX.3. They did not accept my AMEX insurance, neither my Progressive insurance4. Charging $100+ for 4 days rent more and above the advertised rental rate.5. Review.Contenu: I was charged twice for a one day rental on my credit card. When I called to inquire about the charge, my call was dropped numerous times, no one was able to explain the extra charge, I was told to call my financial institution.

Review.Titre: Rentcars
Review.Contenu: The company Rentcars hired to provide our rental vehicle (American) were terrible to deal with.They wanted to charge an extra $30 US a day for insurance and $5000 US deposit on my Visa,despite the paperwork from Rentcars stating that this was not necessary.We argued for about an hour, and eventually left without a vehicle. Because this was on a Sunday and no one was available to help us, we had no choice but to make our way back to the airport to rent another vehicle from another car hire company. When we complained to the Rentcars representatives they were very helpful and are refunding our deposit, but at the time it was very stressful.Rentcars should no longer deal with American car hire.

Review.Titre: The booking process was never completed…
Review.Contenu: The booking process was never completed by their system and they did not inform any further on steps to follow or how to contact the actual agency who is delivering the service. Not recommending this site to anyone.

Review.Titre: ..VERY RUDE STAFF ..The staff at the place where we pick up…
Review.Contenu: The staff at the place where we pick up our car is very rude .. I would say very very rude ..no customer service at all .I was forced to buy the extra insurance (I already bought an insurance but was told that was fake or not effective. A good way of conning people and charging them when they are left with no choice).and when I saud I will complain she said (young Asian lady ..looked like a bangali or indian not sure of her ethnicity but definitely not italian..she laughed and said complain to who .. ha ha ha ..go and complain now as if I care ... I think that attitude for a customer who is paying you lot of money for a good service... 100% DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS COMPANY TO ANYONE  ...

Review.Titre: Rip off company! I wish I could give -1 star
Review.Contenu: I wish I could give -1 star. Worst experience. Total Rip off company for following reasons:1. Hidden fees - the total cost during online checkout is different than the actual one due to many hidden fees. Eventually, its same/more expensive than other regular rental cars (Avis, Hertz).2. Manipulative - I booked an SUV but they manipulated me to agree for a small sedan car with my family/kids. When I argued, then they were like oh! this is the only car available to us currently (I did get an SUV later after much fight).3. They add many additional small charges for small things. Be ready to pay extra for vacuum cleaning, exorbitant amount for gas etc. 4. The rental car unit is 12 mins away from all airports and shuttle only comes every 30 mins. So long wait time. 5. Poor customer service. When we argued with the salesperson about our dispute and asked for manager, we were informed that manager is busy and cannot attend to our complaints. Bottom line - save yourself some money and hassle and do not go for this car rental company. Its only purpose is to rip off people.

Review.Titre: Terrible service, not reliable company
Review.Contenu: When arrived at the airport at 11:00PM with small kid, the prepaid reserved car was not available and there was no replacement. The chat robot on whatsapp was annoying. After we could chat with a real person, they blamed us that we did not pick up the car before10:00AM, though we have informed about our flight arrival time and we asked in advanced whether this is a problem. They had told us there is no problem since there is a 24h service at the airport. But they didn't inform the car rental company. Furthermore, the most flights arrive after 10AM, so how can anybody be sure to get a car? We had a lot of trouble and pain until we could get a overpriced  replacement  car at about 03:00AM next day from another car rental company. rentcars has not refunded our payment despite several requests and of course denies any compensation for the additional costs we had due to their mistakes.

Review.Titre: Pay Now buy How
Review.Contenu: It said on the website to Pay Now but I could not with any of my cards  There was no one to help with this problem and we emailed and got no replys Because of this I will be paying about $60 at the counter.

Review.Titre: Dishonest / Loss of time and money
Review.Contenu: Very bad experience! Based on the other reviews, it is clear that this business is repeatedly using the same fraudulent technics to PURPOSEFULLY fool and scam its customers. I booked unlimited mileage and it was confirmed on the bill. When I went to pick up the car, they told me: 300 km/day maximum for Ontario and Quebec licensed drivers (information they hid with lots of care). Another lie: the famous Ottawa airport pick up! Not to mention the unreasonable amount asked for the credit card. Another customer was in the exact same situation as me. We both cancelled our reservation on the spot because it clearly had a scammy flavour. The whole experience was very upsetting and uncomfortable. Employees are unprofessional and useless perhaps because they are busy milking people's money. Not going back there FOR SURE. Stay away / stay safe folks! I am waiting for my reimbursement and please don't send your useless automatic message that you are sorry and that we need to contact your so called customer service.

Review.Contenu: I came to the airport to pick up the rented car, and the person in the counter person din´t respect the contract, They wanted me to pay 3 times more than the agreed amount for the deposit.I´ll never recommend you.

Review.Titre: Better to go straight to the privider
Review.Contenu: The car rental company was happy to let me return the car 2h late if rentcars modified the reservation. Rentcars refused to do so because their policy is to not make any amendments after picking up the car. Because rentcars did not want to change the reservation we had to pay 24 full hours extra hours for the 2h delay. That taking in account that the car company was happy to do it for free. I'll never use this service again. I'll go straight to the car provider

Review.Titre: Beware - They Don't Include US Taxes
Review.Contenu: Beware - they do not include taxes in the total you pay for US rental, as other search sites do. So when you collect the car you will need to pay quite a significant sum on top of what they have quoted you. In my case $110 of tax above the $522 already paid for the reservation. Factor this in when comparing pricing. My reservation stated I had paid in full and had to pay $0 on collection, but this was not the case.

Review.Titre: Feeling anxious!
Review.Contenu: The booking process went smoothly -- but I am anxious about paying up front  and then reading that there's no fee for amendments, no fee for cancellations and then also reading 5% fee for cancellations and 100% fee for prepay cancellations. Which is it? I rented from Europcar through you -- but when I tried to compare prices to rent directly from Europcar, their site repeatedly says no vehicles available for those dates. Your site says no border crossing is allowed without permission. Where can I get permission to cross into the US from Canada? When I am standing at the rental counter? That's too late, isn't it? My spouse will also need to drive the vehicle, but the cost is not available on the site. Anxiety is rising!

Review.Titre: Website and support is utter rubbish
Review.Contenu: Tried booking online but was unable. The website repeatedly white-screened/crashed during payment. Tried contacting but they have no support desk, so tried the chatbot and it just says someone will be in touch. Who!! support is unmanned!Website is also missing critical information for renting cars, so now have to contact the actual hire company.Much room for improvement, would not use/recommend again.

Review.Titre: It could’ve been better
Review.Contenu: The pickup and communication was great. The car worked well and was as expected. Drop off went fine. The aftermath of my rental is what I am not happy with. I gave a $150 hold for toll roads & such, I was told I’d get the refund from what money wasn’t used within 5-15 days, it has now been almost two months & I have contacted the company numerous times without resolve. I am really bummed. If they would’ve refunded my money as promised, I would give 5 stars. No refund, no receipt showing my toll roads etc. I feel like they stole from me. Such a bummer. :(

Review.Titre: Rentcars & Centauro are both terrible
Review.Contenu: I rented a car in Italy booking through Rentcars.com and using Centauro car hire company - terrible experience. Firstly, when picking up the car, Centauro told us they only accept specific credit cards and that we were meant to be informed about this on our booking voucher. However, the voucher we received from Rentcars.com did not include any information about this. We had to pay extra to add an additional driver and use another card!Secondly, the pick up description on the voucher was completely different from the real shuttle pick up location, making us walk back an forth with heavy luggage an calling Centauro several times. When trying to find a way to give feedback to Rentcars.com, their website obviously only includes an automated chat and no other contact opportunities.Will not be using again!

Review.Titre: Mandatory all-in insurance was not mentioned in advance
Review.Contenu: Having booked a car via Rentcars almost everything went well, we where well informed and the car was ready at the rental company but...The car we had asked for was not the one they had prepared for us. The papers indeed indicated "or similar". "Similar" is a subjective statement. The car we got was smaller and no 4x4 (what we needed to go into the mountains). They stated that they did not even have the car we had asked for. Why did Rentcars not told this in advance? The rental company made us pay for an all-in insurance which was mandatory for this kind of car. This almost doubled the initial price stated by Rentcars. Why where we not informed before we decided to book the car? This would have made us change our booking. On the spot it was to late to change. It's a said happening to start your holidays like this!

The manager asked us to fax a confirmation on the credit card letter head within 2 days of returning the car to avoid being charged for insurance. We did exactly as asked. We have complied with the requirements and have been fighting ever since, but Hertz has charged us making our car renal $348.00 + $470-  double what it should have been. Poor customer service.

Maybe they are aware of their bad practices, however i give them ample opportunity to prove me wrong. The reason i give two stars is because at least upto now their communication has been good even under such bad circumstances. Please prove me wrong about your company and refund the charges not explained on my rental voucher!

Review.Titre: You get what you pay for
Review.Contenu: You get what you pay for!  They were the cheapest, but the process was so challenging that I almost cancelled at the counter.My instructions after booking said to bring Proof of Insurance, so I brought my State Farm Insurance ID card, but upon arrival they "Also Needed" a Dec page showing the Collision coverages and Deductible or you had to pay Their daily insurance charge. Luckily I was able to log in to my insurance comp website via my cell phone and pull up the entire policy, I had a $1,000 Deductible so they were going to charge more $$ to cover the Deductible OR instead of the normal $500 they automatically charge your card, refundable when returned undamaged, they would charge my card $1,000.  So I chose the $1,000 option with no extra insurance payment from them.  The couple next to me, I felt so aweful for. They booked their rental using and AMEX card without issue, but then there at the counter, they also had to pay the refundable deposit but they told them they don't accept AMEX and they didn't have another card.  Not sure what happened to them.The lady at the counter was very rude when I was trying to explain what the Routes website said to bring and how it differed now at the counter. She pulled out a booklet and said you can read this, it is in the fine print. I said that those rules are different than the rules I was given when booking.  She walked away, muttering something in Spanish, leaving my Credit Card & Drivers license sitting on the desk.This is an off site car rental company - the instructions on how to get to the Shuttle are long and challenging. Be prepared to stop multiple times on your "Journey" to find where you actually need to get to.  My opinion, use another company.

Review.Contenu: The "My Bookings" page doesn't contain all my bookings. The process is also quite confusing - I went through the entire payment before finding out the car isn't necessarily available.

It is very difficult to actually talk to a person. To give you an idea of how difficult it was to talk to someone, we tired the WhatsApp number to contact them at 9:38. We eventually received a response at 12:32. Almost 3 hours later.As an overview of what happened, We paid for total insurance, but they didn’t communicate this to the rental agency as the insurance is separate. So to the local agency we only had basic insurance, so if there was a problem, we would be charged by the rental agency then have to claim with Rentcars.com.  After taking a ridiculous amount of time to talk with someone to understand how the insurance worked, we decided that given the difficulty in talking to them, we didn’t want to risk dealing through them, so wanted to cancel, which turned out more difficult than we expected.  We eventually managed to resolve this over the phone, but they initially only cancelled the extra insurance and required another call to get the car refunded.  I have dealt with equivalent aggregate car rental companies in Europe and Australasia, where the rental and insurance is all integrated and it was always reasonably able to be reached if needed. CarRentals.com needs to evolve to be competitive.

ANYTHING? Please!Edit : Concerning rentcars.com response : as I said previously, there's absolutely nowhere on the website where I can contact you directly.Once again, how do I get in contact with you?Last edit : finally got a partial refund more than 5 weeks later.I cannot rate higher as this was an extremely frustrating experience.Please make your support easier to contact without having to use trustpilot as a contact form.

Review.Titre: Agent of Mediocre
Review.Contenu: It's a good rental platform, with competitive prices, and really easy to use. The problems are the rentalcover insurance that is useless because no rental company acknowledge it as a valid insurance, and you always have to pay the rental insurance of the rental company or to make a security deposit of thousands of euros (which often is problematic). And another issue is that it's impossible to change something on your reservation, like to extend it, or change the pickup time, or anything else. Another issue is related to the categories shown on the app, which leaves a wide margin to interpretation. For instance: I've made a reservation for a Peugeot 2008 because I needed a big car, but the insurance company gave me a Dacia Sandero instead, claiming they were the same category. The day an SUV is the same category as an economy vehicle it's going to be tragic. It should be clear which cars belong to each category, otherwise it's just plain cheating. I don't know about other platforms, but this is an average service.

So try to take the good reviews and dont upset people with more formalities ... as you see when i wanted to give you guys a 5* review i had no text. Now im writing you a text and you get 4* and it already took me more than 1 min so the ad on the email is a lie. Review.Titre: Do not trust the quotation!
Review.Contenu: Upon arrival and verification at the pick up location, I was demanded to purchase additional CDW and theft protection as the representative insisted that the coverage that I purchased along with my booking (insured by Rental Cover) does not give any coverage to the rental company ("Green Motion"). Hence they would not provide me the vehicle, unless additional CDW and theft protection is purchased at the spot.As I was in a rush I had no choice but to pay extra for the additional options so I could pick up the vehicle.This creates an unnecessary hassle and additional cost for me as it just appears that the original coverage is somewhat irrelevant if a customer is in such situation, given the vehicle is at their possession, not mine.Most importantly, the price that Rentcars provided was absolutely incorrect because that is NOT going to allow to pick up your car, unless paying extra as demanded by the rental company.Have reported the case since end of August and still have not received any constructive feedback as to date. Would rather book via other agencies instead.Update as of Oct 26th: Problem resolved after numerous attempts to reach out to the team (even an escalation email to the CEO). Long story short, the excessive amount that I paid for was refunded at last. Thanks Pamela for the help. My opinion remains unchanged that the quotation provided by the company is not accurate. Believe that's something the company should consider including going forward.

Review.Titre: Amazing customer service!
Review.Contenu: Rented a car through Rentcars to pick up at Cancun airport (at a great price!). However our flight was delayed and the rental company (Keddy) had already closed by the time we arrived.We couldn't get through to speak to someone at Keddy so we ended up just renting a car at a different rental company the following day so that we could continue with our holidays.I assumed that we'd lost the money paid on our original booking through Rentcars, as I never showed up to pick up the car. However when we returned from our 2-week holiday I contacted the amazing customer service at Rentcars just in case: After they checked with Keddy to confirm that we didn't pick up the car they sent me a full refund for the booking! In retrospect I should have contacted Rentcars when I arrived late to Mexico, rather than trying to reach Keddy. I'm sure they'd have sorted it out somehow!

Review.Titre: Good price and (eventually) good support
Review.Contenu: Rentcars gave me a good deal on a car rental, more than $100 cheaper than other options I had found, which was great. However, even though I paid in full in advance for my rental, I was charged $110.00 in erroneous charges by the car company and wanted to contact Rentcars to help me with the dispute. Initially I had difficulty receiving support because other than a chatbot, I wasn't able to find a way to contact support, which was a bit frustrating. However, upon leaving a review on this site, I was contacted right away by a representative and they helped me sort out the problem, thankfully. They even asked me about my experience with the chatbot because they want to make sure it's working properly. Because of the good support that I eventually received, I'll definitely consider Rentcars again as an option for finding a good deal on a car.

Review.Titre: Rentcars.com Review:good experience
Review.Contenu: Rentcars.com Review:I recently used Rentcars.com for a car rental during my vacation, and I was pleasantly surprised by the overall experience. Here are the key highlights of my experience with Rentcars.com:1. User-Friendly Website: Rentcars.com has a user-friendly website with an intuitive interface. It was easy to navigate, and I was able to find the information I needed quickly.2. Wide Selection of Vehicles: I was impressed with the vast selection of vehicles available for rental. Whether you need a compact car for city exploration or a spacious SUV for a family trip, Rentcars.com offers a variety of options to suit different preferences and budgets.3. Competitive Prices: Rentcars.com provided competitive rental rates. I compared prices with other rental platforms, and Rentcars.com offered a good deal that was within my budget.4. Convenient Booking Process: The booking process was straightforward and hassle-free. I appreciated the clear and transparent rental terms and conditions, which helped me make an informed decision.5. Excellent Customer Support: I had a few questions about my rental, and the customer support team was responsive and helpful. They were available through multiple channels, including live chat and email.6. Flexible Cancellation Policy: Life can be unpredictable, and it's reassuring to know that Rentcars.com offers a flexible cancellation policy. I had to make a change to my reservation, and the process was smooth and accommodating.7. Partnered Rental Companies: Rentcars.com partners with reputable car rental companies, which gave me peace of mind knowing I would be dealing with established and trusted providers.Overall, my experience with Rentcars.com was positive. The booking process was convenient, the prices were competitive, and the customer support was reliable. I would recommend Rentcars.com to anyone looking for a hassle-free and cost-effective car rental experience.
